testcase.name: select stmt test case
testcase.system-out: * def db = Java.type('misc.MyDBUtil') ..................................... passed * def rows = db.selectStatement("select * from tools") .................... passed * print rows .............................................................. passed * match rows contains "Selenium" .......................................... passed

testcase.name: insert stmt test case
testcase.system-out: * def db = Java.type('misc.MyDBUtil') ..................................... passed * def rows = db.selectStatement("select * from tools") .................... passed * print rows .............................................................. passed * match rows contains "Selenium" .......................................... passed * def db = Java.type('misc.MyDBUtil') ..................................... passed * def res = db.insertStatement("Insert into tools values(5230,'ssdfdample2','xyzs')") . passed * print res ............................................................... passed * match res == 'Success' .................................................. passed

testcase.name: update stmt test case
testcase.system-out: * def db = Java.type('misc.MyDBUtil') ..................................... passed * def rows = db.selectStatement("select * from tools") .................... passed * print rows .............................................................. passed * match rows contains "Selenium" .......................................... passed * def db = Java.type('misc.MyDBUtil') ..................................... passed * def res = db.insertStatement("Insert into tools values(5230,'ssdfdample2','xyzs')") . passed * print res ............................................................... passed * match res == 'Success' .................................................. passed * def db = Java.type('misc.MyDBUtil') ..................................... passed * def rowsAffected = db.updateStatement("update tools set name='sampleV3' where id=5230") . passed * print rowsAffected ...................................................... passed * assert rowsAffected >= 1 ................................................ passed

testcase.name: delete stmt test case
testcase.system-out: * def db = Java.type('misc.MyDBUtil') ..................................... passed * def rows = db.selectStatement("select * from tools") .................... passed * print rows .............................................................. passed * match rows contains "Selenium" .......................................... passed * def db = Java.type('misc.MyDBUtil') ..................................... passed * def res = db.insertStatement("Insert into tools values(5230,'ssdfdample2','xyzs')") . passed * print res ............................................................... passed * match res == 'Success' .................................................. passed * def db = Java.type('misc.MyDBUtil') ..................................... passed * def rowsAffected = db.updateStatement("update tools set name='sampleV3' where id=5230") . passed * print rowsAffected ...................................................... passed * assert rowsAffected >= 1 ................................................ passed * def db = Java.type('misc.MyDBUtil') ..................................... passed * def rowsAffected = db.deleteStatement("delete from tools where id=5230") . passed * print rowsAffected ...................................................... passed * assert rowsAffected >= 1 ................................................ passed
